global.title: Agon KOLGECI
global.description: Passionate since my youngest age by computers, I devote my time to realize various projects allowing me to enrich my own knowledge.
global.keywords: Agon KOLGECI, Software Developer, Passionate Developer, Computer Enthusiast, Software Projects, Knowledge Enrichment, Coding Expert, Developer Portfolio, Tech Enthusiast, Programming Projects, Skilled Coder, Computer Science, Development Skills, Innovative Software, Personal Projects, Technology Passion, Young Developer, Self-Learning, IT Professional, Tech Projects

about.title: About Me
about.description: Discover who I am, my passions, and the journey that has shaped me. Learn about my background and my interests.
about.presentation: Hi, I'm Agon KOLGECI, a young software developer currently studying in Computer Science. Since I was young, I've been able to discover, learn and experiment with various technologies on a self-taught basis, which has enabled me to develop a real passion for IT and acquire a variety of skills in this field. All my experiences motivated me to continue my studies in this field to deepen my knowledge and become an expert capable of creating innovative solutions. Today, I'm determined to continue on this path and improve every day to achieve my goals.

discover.title: Discover more
discover.description: It's not over, it's just the beginning. Discover what I'm capable of by browsing my site!

knowledge.title: Explore my knowledge
knowledge.description: Delve into the skills and education I have acquired over the years. From technical proficiencies to academic achievements. This section showcases the breadth of my learning journey.

career.title: View my career
career.description: Take a look at my personal and professional experiences, highlighting the roles I have taken on and the projects I have contributed to. This section provides an in-depth look at my career path.

creations.title: Discover my creations
creations.description: Explore a collection of my personal projects and creative works. From design to development, this gallery showcases my passion for creation and innovation.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Over the years, I've been able to develop and gain experience in a variety of skills.

it_skills.title: IT Skills
it_skills.description: Programming languages and tools I master.

soft_skills.title: Soft Skills
soft_skills.description: Various soft skills acquired during the different projects I've worked on.

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.description: I am highly motivated in everything I undertake and love exploring various topics.

adaptation.title: Adaptation
adaptation.description: I easily adapt to different situations and always strive to do my best.

autonomy.title: Autonomy
autonomy.description: I'm mainly self-taught, I know how to be autonomous to reach my goal.

team_work.title: Team Work
team_work.description: I am able to collaborate and respect different points of view in order to actively contribute to the group's objectives.

education.title: Education
education.description: Learn more about my academic background and how it has contributed to my skills in computer science and development.

school_career.title: School career
school_career.description: After finishing high school, I went straight into a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I'm passionate about technology and innovation, and it's a real pleasure to be able to work in this field.

unige.title: University of Geneva: Bachelor of Computer Science
unige.description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science provides a solid foundation in algorithms, computer systems and security, software engineering, digital imaging, theoretical computer science and multimedia information processing.

stael.title: High School: Madame de Staël
stael.description: High School Diploma general and sciences.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.description: Discover my experiences in which I was able to solidify my knowledge and skills. These include both personal and professional experiences.

personal_experiences.title: Personal Experiences
personal_experiences.description: Thanks to my personal experiences, I've been able to solidify my skills in certain areas and acquire a real grasp of the environment.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Execution of various projects related to web development, including the creation of responsive and dynamic websites. Projects include the design and implementation of front-end features using modern technologies.

tasks.1: Creating interactive websites with familiar frameworks like React, NextJS
tasks.2: Using CSS preprocessors like Sass for advanced styling

discord.title: Discord Development
discord.description: Realization of various projects related to the development of Discord bots and server management tools, particularly focused on enhancing user engagement and community automation.

tasks.1: Designing and implementing new features using Java and JavaScript
tasks.2: Integrating APIs and managing data flow between Discord and external services
tasks.3: Developing and maintaining custom bot commands to streamline server operations

minecraft.title: Minecraft Development
minecraft.description: Realization of various projects related to the operation of Minecraft servers, particularly in the development of Spigot/Bukkit plugins, management of servers and communications between them.

tasks.1: Optimizing and implementing existing Java code or writing new systems (some available on GitHub)
tasks.2: Deployment and commissioning of infrastructure in Linux environments
tasks.3: Discord bots development using the Discord API for community server automation

professional_experiences.title: Professional Experiences
professional_experiences.description: During my career, I was able to collaborate with diverse teams, and develop innovative solutions that supported operational success.

world-heberg.title: World-Heberg
world-heberg.description: Association providing free hosting services including web solutions, nodejs instances, cloud offerings and Sinus instances.

tasks.1: Member of the administration team as Moderation team leader
tasks.2: Development of Discord moderation tools necessary for the proper functioning of the moderation

buro_plus.title: Buro +
buro_plus.description: No.1 network for office/computer supplies in France.

tasks.1: Verification of the authenticity of the material
tasks.3: Registration of items using the software

academic_experiences.title: Academic Experiences
academic_experiences.description: This section highlights my academic achievements and experiences, including coursework, research projects, and participation in academic projects.

swerc2024.title: SWERC 2024
swerc2024.description: SWERC is a 5-hour programming contest for teams of three students, focused on algorithmic problem solving and practical coding. This competition serves as the regional selection phase for the Europe Championship and the International Collegiate Programming Contest.

tasks.1: Participated in my first algorithmic competition, gaining valuable experience in problem-solving, teamwork, and high-pressure coding challenges.
tasks.2: Developed and debugged programs in C++ to handle dynamic data structures and optimize resource usage during the competition.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Find out about the different creations I've made or taken part in. These have helped me learn more about certain aspects of development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: List of all the projects I have been involved in.

project-family.title: Project Family
project-family.description: Project Family is a vanilla survival Minecraft server in the newest Java Edition which brought together a large number of people. Latest version: the 1.20, 'Trails and Tales' update.

nexus.title: Nexus
nexus.description: Nexus is my Minecraft mini-games server. The main purpose of this server is to list all the creations I've made over the years on Minecraft.

stranger-hide.title: Stranger Hide
stranger-hide.description: Stranger Hide is a hide-and-seek server in the theme of the Stranger Things series.

playze-family-bot.title: Playze Family Bot
playze-family-bot.description: Playze Family is a Discord bot with a multitude of features such as the addition of an XP and level system with a ranking by chatting or interacting with other server members, the creation of Giveaways contests, the possible edition of the best rank obtainable for free from the server: the Custom Grade, the choice of notifications you wish to receive, the addition of the GPT Chat API (if you talk to it, it will answer you), etc. ...

berkasia.title: Berkasia
berkasia.description: Minecraft PVP/Faction server featuring new events, a carefully thought-out economy and advanced systems to help you achieve your goals. Berkasia featured a completely Farm2Win system.

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: List of all my source code available to everyone mainly on GitHub.

view_archives.description: Archived repositories are outdated and no longer representative of my current work.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach me for inquiries or simply to connect!

contact_form.title: Get In Touch
contact_form.description: Fill in the contact form below to send your message.

alerts.fields_missing: Please fill out all required fields in the form before submitting.
alerts.recaptcha_invalid: Please complete the reCAPTCHA verification before submitting.
alerts.sended: Thank you for your message. I have received it and will get back to you shortly by e-mail.
alerts.unknown_error: Sorry, but an error occurred and your message could not be sent. Please try again later.
